user_profile.name: Yuki Tanaka
user_profile.description: Yuki is a 68-year-old retired engineer from Japan, who appreciates structure but also enjoys thinking creatively about solutions. Having a moderate level of technical experience and a balanced decision-making style, Yuki is currently seeking a caregiver for a close friend in need, motivated by a desire to ensure a high-quality life for them despite the social pressure and mixed experiences he's faced in the past.

task_profile.task: find a caregiver for an elderly person

instructions.dialogue: Use vague or ambiguous language about your needs.
instructions.profile: Be very reluctant to share your profile information.
instructions.hidden_state: Express very subtle emotions and intentions in your inner thoughts.

usage_scenarios: Daily assistance with meals and medications
task_specific_attributes.purchase_location: Local caregiving agencies or online platforms
